    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD><B>Item&nbsp;10.</B></TD>
    <TD>
    <B><I><U>Directors and Executive Officers of the
    Company.</U></I></B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 12pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">
<B><U>Directors of the Company</U></B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Information regarding directors of the Company required by this
Item is incorporated by reference to the section entitled
&#147;Election of Directors&nbsp;&#151; Nominees for
Directors&#148; set forth in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement
for its 2006 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
The information regarding compliance with Section&nbsp;16(a) of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 required by this Item is
incorporated by reference to the section entitled
&#147;Section&nbsp;16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting
Compliance&#148; set forth in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement
for its 2006 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Information regarding the Company&#146;s audit committee
financial experts and code of ethics and business conduct
required by this item is incorporated by reference to the
section entitled &#147;Matters Relating to Corporate Governance,
Board Structure, Director Compensation and Stock Ownership&#148;
set forth in the Company&#146;s Proxy Statement for its 2006
Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
No director or nominee for director of the Company has any
family relationship with any other director or nominee or with
any executive officer of the Company.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 12pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">
<B><U>Executive Officers of the Company</U></B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
MARVIN J. GIROUARD, age&nbsp;66, has served as Chairman and
Chief Executive Officer of the Company since March 1999 and has
been a member of the Executive Committee since December 1998. He
has been a Director of the Company since August 1988. From June
1998 to February 1999, Mr.&nbsp;Girouard served as President and
Chief Executive Officer of the Company and from August 1988 to
June 1998 he served as President and Chief Operating Officer of
the Company. From May 1985 until August 1988, he served as
Senior Vice President of Merchandising of Pier&nbsp;1 Imports
(U.S.), Inc.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
CHARLES H. TURNER, age&nbsp;49, has served as Executive Vice
President of Finance since April 2002 and has served as Chief
Financial Officer and Treasurer of the Company since August
1999. He served as Senior Vice President of Finance of the
Company from August 1999 to April 2002. He served as Senior Vice
President of Stores of the Company from August 1994 to August
1999, and served as Controller and Principal Accounting Officer
of the Company from January 1992 to August 1994.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
GREGORY S. HUMENESKY, age&nbsp;54, has served as Executive Vice
President of Human Resources of the Company since February 2005.
Prior to joining the Company, he served as Senior Vice President
of Human Resources at Zale Corporation from April 1996 to
February 2005.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
JAY R. JACOBS, age&nbsp;51, has served as Executive Vice
President of Merchandising of the Company since April 2002. He
served as Senior Vice President of Merchandising of the Company
from May 1995 to April 2002. He served as Vice President of
Divisional Merchandising of Pier&nbsp;1 Imports (U.S.), Inc.
from May 1993 to May 1995, and served as Director of Divisional
Merchandising of Pier&nbsp;1 Imports (U.S.), Inc. from July 1991
to May 1993.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
PHIL E. SCHNEIDER, age&nbsp;54, has served as Executive Vice
President of Marketing of the Company since April 2002. He
served as Senior Vice President of Marketing of the Company from
May 1993 to April 2002, and served as Vice President of
Advertising of Pier&nbsp;1 Imports (U.S.), Inc. from January
1988 to May 1993.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff;">77

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DAVID A. WALKER, age&nbsp;55, has served as Executive Vice
President of Logistics and Allocations of the Company since
April 2002. He served as Senior Vice President of Logistics and
Allocations of the Company from September 1999 to April 2002. He
served as Vice President of Planning and Allocations of Pier 1
Imports (U.S.), Inc. from January 1994 to September 1999, and
served as Director of Merchandise Services of Pier&nbsp;1
Imports (U.S.), Inc. from October 1989 to January 1994.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
E.&nbsp;MITCHELL WEATHERLY, age&nbsp;58, has served as Executive
Vice President of Stores of the Company since December 2004. He
served as Executive Vice President of Human Resources of the
Company from April 2002 to December 2004. He served as Senior
Vice President of Human Resources of the Company from June 1992
to April 2002, and served as Vice President of Human Resources
of the Company from June 1989 to June 1992 and of Pier&nbsp;1
Imports (U.S.), Inc. from August 1985 to June 1992.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
The officers of the Company are appointed by the Board of
Directors, hold office until their successors are elected and
qualified and/or until their earlier death, resignation or
removal.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10.0pt;color: #000000; background: #ffffff; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 0; ">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
None of the above executive officers has any family relationship
with any other of such officers or with any director of the
Company. None of such officers was selected pursuant to any
arrangement or understanding between him and any other person.
</DIV>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.14.2
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>d35035exv10w14w2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>AMENDMENT NOS. 1, 2, 3 AND 4 TO CERTIFICATE PURCHASE AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w14w2</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">Exhibit&nbsp;10.14.2
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">&#091;Execution Copy&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">FIRST AMENDMENT AGREEMENT
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This First Amendment Agreement (&#147;Amendment&#148;) is executed as of the 17<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP> day of
June, 2003, by and among Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., a Delaware limited liability company, as
transferor (the &#147;Transferor&#148;), Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., a Delaware corporation, as servicer
(the &#147;Servicer&#148;), the &#147;Class&nbsp;A Purchasers&#148; parties to the Certificate Purchase Agreement referred
to below, and JPMorgan Chase Bank (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York)
(&#147;JPMorgan Chase&#148;), as agent (in such capacity, the &#147;Administrative Agent&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">W I T N E S S E T H:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the Transferor, the Servicer, the Class&nbsp;A Purchases named therein and the
Administrative Agent executed the Certificate Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as
amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;);
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the sole Class&nbsp;A Purchasers parties to the Purchase Agreement as of the date hereof
are Delaware Funding Corporation, as the Structured Investor, and JPMorgan Chase, as the sole
Committed Investor; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the parties hereto have agreed to amend the Purchase Agreement on the terms and
conditions hereinafter set forth.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 1. <U>Amendment of the Purchase Agreement</U>. Effective on the date hereof and
subject to the satisfaction of the condition precedent set forth in Section&nbsp;2 below, the Purchase
Agreement is hereby amended as follows:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) The definition of &#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date </U>&#148; set forth in
Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall mean, for each
Committed Investor, the earlier of (i)&nbsp;September&nbsp;2, 2003, as such
date may be extended with respect to such Committed Purchaser from
time to time in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.11 of this Agreement and
(ii)&nbsp;the Business Day specified by the Transferor by at least 30
days prior written notice to the Administrative Agent and each
Committed Investor.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) The definition of &#147;<U>Structured Investor Event</U>&#148; set forth in Section
1.01 of the Purchase Agreement is deleted in its entirety.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 2. <U>Condition Precedent</U>. This Amendment shall become effective as of the date
hereof upon the execution of this Amendment by all of the parties hereto and the execution and
delivery of the Consent to Amendment to Purchase Agreement attached hereto.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 3. <U>Miscellaneous</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1 <U>Ratification</U>. As amended hereby, the Purchase Agreement is in all respects
ratified and confirmed and the Purchase Agreement as so supplemented by this Amendment shall be
read, taken and construed as one and the same instrument.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2 <U>Representation and Warranty</U>. Each of the Transferor and the Servicer represents
and warrants that this Amendment has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by it and
constitutes its legal, valid and binding obligation, enforceable in accordance with its terms,
except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, fraudulent
transfer, moratorium or other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally and by general
principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding at
law or in equity).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3 <U>Governing Law; Parties; Severability</U>. This Amendment shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws and decisions (as opposed to the conflicts of law provisions)
of the State of New York. Whenever in this Amendment there is a reference made to any of the
parties hereto, such reference shall also be a reference to the successors and assigns of such
party, including, without limitation, any debtor-in-possession or trustee. The provisions of this
Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the successors and assigns of the
parties hereto. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such a
manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of this Amendment
shall be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, such provision shall be ineffective to the
extent of such prohibition or invalidity without invalidating the remainder of such provision or
the remaining provisions of this Amendment.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the
same instrument.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">2
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Transferor, the Servicer and the Trustee have caused this Amendment to
be fully executed by their respective officers as of the day and year first above written.
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>CONSENT TO AMENDMENT TO PURCHASE AGREEMENT</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The undersigned, as the Trustee under the &#147;Supplement&#148; (as defined in the Certificate Purchase
Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as heretofore amended, the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;), among
Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., as the transferor, Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., as the servicer, the Class
A Purchasers named therein and JPMorgan Chase Bank (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company
of New York), as the administrative agent), hereby consents to the terms and conditions of the
First Amendment Agreement dated as of June&nbsp;17, 2003, relating to the Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->

</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD colspan="3" valign="top" align="left">WELLS FARGO BANK
MINNESOTA, <BR>NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as the Trustee</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">&#091;Execution Copy&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">SECOND AMENDMENT AGREEMENT
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Second Amendment Agreement (&#147;Amendment&#148;) is executed as of the 2<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">nd</SUP> day of
September, 2003, by and among Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., a Delaware limited liability company, as
transferor (the &#147;Transferor&#148;), Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., a Delaware corporation, as servicer
(the &#147;Servicer&#148;), the &#147;Class&nbsp;A Purchasers&#148; parties to the Certificate Purchase Agreement referred
to below, and JPMorgan Chase Bank (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York)
(&#147;JPMorgan Chase&#148;), as agent (in such capacity, the &#147;Administrative Agent&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">W I T N E S S E T H:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the Transferor, the Servicer, the Class&nbsp;A Purchases named therein and the
Administrative Agent executed the Certificate Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as
amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;);
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the sole Class&nbsp;A Purchasers parties to the Purchase Agreement as of the date hereof
are Delaware Funding Corporation, as the Structured Investor, and JPMorgan Chase, as the sole
Committed Investor; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the parties hereto have agreed to amend the Purchase Agreement on the terms and
conditions hereinafter set forth.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 1. <U>Amendment of the Purchase Agreement</U>. Effective on the date hereof and
subject to the satisfaction of the condition precedent set forth in Section&nbsp;2 below, the Purchase
Agreement is hereby amended as follows:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) The definition of &#147;<U>Alternative Rate</U>&#148; set forth in Section&nbsp;1.01 of
the Purchase Agreement is hereby amended to delete the reference therein to &#147;1.00%
per annum&#148; and repalce it with a reference ot &#147;0.80% per annum.&#148;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) The followng new definition is added to Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase
Agreement in appropriate alphabetical position:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Adjusted Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit</U>&#148; shall mean at any
time 102% of the Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit at such time.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c) The definition of &#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Projected Monthly Interest and Fees</U>&#148;
set forth in Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase Agreement is amended and restated in its
entirety to readas follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Projected Monthly Interest and Fees</U>&#148; shall
mean, for any date of determination for any Monthly Period, the sum
of (i)&nbsp;one-twelfth of the product of the Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit and
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">5
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">the Prime Rate as in effect on the first day of such Monthly
Period, plus (ii)&nbsp;one-twelfth of the product of the Class&nbsp;A Purchase
Limit and the Class&nbsp;A Utilization Fee Rate, plus (iii)&nbsp;one-twelfth
of the product of the Adjusted Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit and the Class
A Facility Fee Rate, plus (iv)&nbsp;the aggregate of the Investor Default
Amounts for each theretofore elapsed day in such Monthly Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d) The definition of &#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; set forth in
Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase Agreement is amended and restated in its entirety to
read as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall mean, for each
Committed Investor, the earlier of (i)&nbsp;August&nbsp;31, 2004, as such date
may be extended with respect to such Committed Investor from time to
time in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.11 of this Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the
Business Day specified by the Transferor by at least 30&nbsp;days prior
written notice to the Administrative Agent and each Committed
Investor.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e) Section&nbsp;2.03(e) of the Purchase Agreement is amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e) The Administrative Agent shall be entitled to be paid, for
the account of the Class&nbsp;A Purchasers, but only to the extent funds
are then or thereafter become available therefor pursuant to the
Supplement in respect of Class&nbsp;A Monthly Interest and Fees, a
facility fee (the &#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Facility Fee</U>&#148;) for each Interest
Accrual Period (or portion thereof) prior to the commencement of the
Amortization Period calculated at a rate per annum equal to the
Class&nbsp;A Facility Fee Rate in respect of the average daily Adjusted
Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit during such Interest Accrual Period,
calculated on the basis of the actual number of days elapsed in a
year having 360&nbsp;days. The Class&nbsp;A Facility Fee shall be payable on
each Distribution Date for the most recently completed Interest
Accrual Period and on the date of the termination of this Agreement.
Each Class&nbsp;A Purchaser shall be entitled to receive the share of
the Class&nbsp;A Facility Fee as may be agreed upon from time to time
between such Class&nbsp;A Purchasers and the Administrative Agent.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f) Section&nbsp;7.11(a) of the Purchase Agreement is amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) All notices and other communications provided for
hereunder shall be in writing (including telecopy or electronic
transmission) and, (i)&nbsp;if to Funding, Pier 1 or the Trustee, mailed,
telecopied, transmitted electronically, couriered or delivered to
it,
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">6
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">addressed to it at its address set forth in the Pooling and
Servicing Agreement (or, in the case of a telecopy to (x)&nbsp;Funding to
telecopier no. 817-252-7881, (y)&nbsp;Pier 1 to telecopier no.
817-252-7881 and (z)&nbsp;the Trustee to telecopier no. 612-667-3464,
and, in the case of electronic transmission to (x)&nbsp;Funding to
<I>administrator@pier1.com, </I>(y)&nbsp;Pier 1 to <I>administrator@pier1.com</I>, and
(z)&nbsp;the Trustee to <I>sue.dignan@wellsfargo.com</I>; (ii)&nbsp;if to DFC,
mailed, telecopied, transmitted electronically, couriered or
delivered to it, addressed to it at Delaware Funding Corporation,
c/o J H Management Corporation, One International Place, Room&nbsp;608,
Boston, Massachusetts 02110-2624 (<U>Attention</U>: President)
or, in the case of telecopy, to telecopier no. 617-951-7050
(confirmation telephone no. 617-951-7000), with a copy to the
Administrative Agent; (iii)&nbsp;if to the Administrative Agent, mailed,
telecopied, transmitted electronically, couriered or delivered to
it, addressed to it at JPMorgan Chase Bank, Institutional Trust
Services, 4 New York Plaza, 6<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP> Floor, New York, New York
10004 (<U>Attention</U>: Conduit Administration) or, in the case
of telecopy, to telecopier no. 212-623-5980 (confirmation telephone
no. 212-623-5370), or, in the case of electronic transmission, to
<I>cpadmin@jpmorgan.com, </I>with a copy to JPMorgan Chase Services, Inc.,
500 Stanton Christiana Road, Newark, Delaware 19713-2107
(<U>Attention</U>: Lisa Haines /2/CS) or, in the case of telecopy,
to telecopier no. 302-634-5490, (confirmation telephone no.
302-634-5494); or (iv)&nbsp;if to any other party, as such party may
direct in a written notice to the other parties. All such notices
and other communications shall, when mailed, be effective on the
fifth Business Day addressed as aforesaid thereafter or, if sent by
telecopier or electronic transmission, when transmitted (receipt
confirmed). Any party hereto may change the address, telecopier
number to which notices to it are to be sent by written notice given
to the other parties hereto.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 2. <U>Condition Precedent</U>. This Amendment shall become effective as of the date
hereof upon the execution of this Amendment by all of the parties hereto and the execution and
delivery of the Consent to Amendment to Purchase Agreement attached hereto.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 3. <U>Miscellaneous</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1 <U>Ratification</U>. As amended hereby, the Purchase Agreement is in all respects
ratified and confirmed and the Purchase Agreement as so supplemented by this Amendment shall be
read, taken and construed as one and the same instrument.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2 <U>Representation and Warranty</U>. Each of the Transferor and the Servicer represents
and warrants that this Amendment has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by it and
constitutes its legal, valid and binding obligation, enforceable in accordance with its terms,
except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization,
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">7
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">fraudulent transfer, moratorium or other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally
and by general principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a
proceeding at law or in equity).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3 <U>Governing Law; Parties; Severability</U>. This Amendment shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws and decisions (as opposed to the conflicts of law provisions)
of the State of New York. Whenever in this Amendment there is a reference made to any of the
parties hereto, such reference shall also be a reference to the successors and assigns of such
party, including, without limitation, any debtor-in-possession or trustee. The provisions of this
Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the successors and assigns of the
parties hereto. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such a
manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of this Amendment
shall be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, such provision shall be ineffective to the
extent of such prohibition or invalidity without invalidating the remainder of such provision or
the remaining provisions of this Amendment.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the
same instrument.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">8
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Transferor, the Servicer and the Trustee have caused this Amendment to
be fully executed by their respective officers as of the day and year first above written.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">&#091;Consent to Amendment to Purchase Agreement Attached&#093;
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">9
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>CONSENT TO AMENDMENT TO PURCHASE AGREEMENT</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The undersigned, as the Trustee under the &#147;Supplement&#148; (as defined in the Certificate Purchase
Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as heretofore amended, the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;), among
Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., as the transferor, Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., as the servicer, the Class
A Purchasers named therein and JPMorgan Chase Bank (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company
of New York), as the administrative agent), hereby consents to the terms and conditions of the
Second Amendment Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;2, 2003, relating to the Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">&#091;Execution Copy&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">THIRD AMENDMENT AGREEMENT
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Third Amendment Agreement (&#147;Amendment&#148;) is executed as of the 31<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">st</SUP> day of
August, 2004, by and among Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., a Delaware limited liability company, as
transferor (the &#147;Transferor&#148;), Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., a Delaware corporation, as servicer
(the &#147;Servicer&#148;), the &#147;Class&nbsp;A Purchasers&#148; parties to the Certificate Purchase Agreement referred
to below, and JPMorgan Chase Bank (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York)
(&#147;JPMorgan Chase&#148;), as agent (in such capacity, the &#147;Administrative Agent&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">W I T N E S S E T H:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the Transferor, the Servicer, the Class&nbsp;A Purchases named therein and the
Administrative Agent executed the Certificate Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as
amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;);
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the sole Class&nbsp;A Purchasers parties to the Purchase Agreement as of the date hereof
are Delaware Funding Company, LLC (as successor to Delaware Funding Corporation), as the Structured
Investor, and JPMorgan Chase, as the sole Committed Investor; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the parties hereto have agreed to amend the Purchase Agreement on the terms and
conditions hereinafter set forth.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 1. <U>Amendment of the Purchase Agreement</U>. Effective on the date hereof and
subject to the satisfaction of the condition precedent set forth in Section&nbsp;2 below, the Purchase
Agreement is hereby amended by amendeing and restating in its entirety the definition of
&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; set forth in Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase Agreement to read as
follows:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall mean, for each Committed Investor,
the earlier of (i)&nbsp;August&nbsp;30, 2005, as such date may be extended with respect to
such Committed Investor from time to time in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.11 of this
Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the Business Day specified by the Transferor by at least 30&nbsp;days
prior written notice to the Administrative Agent and each Committed Investor.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 2. <U>Condition Precedent</U>. This Amendment shall become effective as of the date
hereof upon the execution of this Amendment by all of the parties hereto and the execution and
delivery of the Consent to Amendment to Purchase Agreement attached hereto.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">11
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 3. <U>Miscellaneous</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1 <U>Ratification</U>. As amended hereby, the Purchase Agreement is in all respects
ratified and confirmed and the Purchase Agreement as so supplemented by this Amendment shall be
read, taken and construed as one and the same instrument.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2 <U>Representation and Warranty</U>. Each of the Transferor and the Servicer represents
and warrants that this Amendment has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by it and
constitutes its legal, valid and binding obligation, enforceable in accordance with its terms,
except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, fraudulent
transfer, moratorium or other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally and by general
principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding at
law or in equity).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3 <U>Governing Law; Parties; Severability</U>. This Amendment shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws and decisions (as opposed to the conflicts of law provisions)
of the State of New York. Whenever in this Amendment there is a reference made to any of the
parties hereto, such reference shall also be a reference to the successors and assigns of such
party, including, without limitation, any debtor-in-possession or trustee. The provisions of this
Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the successors and assigns of the
parties hereto. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such a
manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of this Amendment
shall be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, such provision shall be ineffective to the
extent of such prohibition or invalidity without invalidating the remainder of such provision or
the remaining provisions of this Amendment.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the
same instrument.
</DIV>

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">&#091;Execution Copy&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">FOURTH AMENDMENT AGREEMENT
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Fourth Amendment Agreement (&#147;Amendment&#148;) is executed as of the 30<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP> day of
August, 2005, by and among Pier 1 Funding, L.L.C., a Delaware limited liability company, as
transferor (the &#147;Transferor&#148;), Pier 1 Imports (U.S.), Inc., a Delaware corporation, as servicer
(the &#147;Servicer&#148;), the &#147;Class&nbsp;A Purchasers&#148; parties to the Certificate Purchase Agreement referred
to below, and JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. (as successor to Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York)
(&#147;JPMorgan Chase&#148;), as agent (in such capacity, the &#147;Administrative Agent&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">W I T N E S S E T H:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the Transferor, the Servicer, the Class&nbsp;A Purchases named therein and the
Administrative Agent executed the Certificate Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as
amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;);
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the sole Class&nbsp;A Purchasers parties to the Purchase Agreement as of the date hereof
are Delaware Funding Company, LLC (as successor to Delaware Funding Corporation), as the Structured
Investor, and JPMorgan Chase, as the sole Committed Investor; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the parties hereto have agreed to amend the Purchase Agreement on the terms and
conditions hereinafter set forth.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 1. <U>Amendment of the Purchase Agreement</U>. Effective on the date hereof and
subject to the satisfaction of the condition precedent set forth in Section&nbsp;2 below, the Purchase
Agreement is hereby amended by amending and restating in its entirety the definition of
&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; set forth in Section&nbsp;1.01 of the Purchase Agreement to read as
follows:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 1%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall mean, for each Committed Investor,
the earlier of (i)&nbsp;September&nbsp;9, 2005, as such date may be extended with respect to
such Committed Investor from time to time in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.11 of this
Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the Business Day specified by the Transferor by at least 30&nbsp;days
prior written notice to the Administrative Agent and each Committed Investor.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 2. <U>Condition Precedent</U>. This Amendment shall become effective as of the
date hereof upon the execution of this Amendment by all of the parties hereto and the execution and
delivery of the Consent to Amendment to Purchase Agreement attached hereto.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">15
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION 3. <U>Miscellaneous</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1 <U>Ratification</U>. As amended hereby, the Purchase Agreement is in all respects
ratified and confirmed and the Purchase Agreement as so supplemented by this Amendment shall be
read, taken and construed as one and the same instrument.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2 <U>Representation and Warranty</U>. Each of the Transferor and the Servicer represents
and warrants that this Amendment has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by it and
constitutes its legal, valid and binding obligation, enforceable in accordance with its terms,
except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, fraudulent
transfer, moratorium or other similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally and by general
principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding at
law or in equity).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3 <U>Governing Law; Parties; Severability</U>. This Amendment shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws and decisions (as opposed to the conflicts of law provisions)
of the State of New York. Whenever in this Amendment there is a reference made to any of the
parties hereto, such reference shall also be a reference to the successors and assigns of such
party, including, without limitation, any debtor-in-possession or trustee. The provisions of this
Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the successors and assigns of the
parties hereto. Whenever possible, each provision of this Amendment shall be interpreted in such a
manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of this Amendment
shall be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, such provision shall be ineffective to the
extent of such prohibition or invalidity without invalidating the remainder of such provision or
the remaining provisions of this Amendment.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each
of which shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the
same instrument.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">16
</DIV>

be fully executed by their respective officers as of the day and year first above written.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>CONSENT TO AMENDMENT TO PURCHASE AGREEMENT</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The undersigned, as the Trustee under the &#147;Supplement&#148; (as defined in the Certificate Purchase
Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as amended, the &#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;), among Pier 1

Purchasers named therein and JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. (as successor to JPMorgan Chase Bank), as
the administrative agent), hereby consents to the terms and conditions of the Fourth Amendment
Agreement dated as of August&nbsp;30, 2005, relating to the Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>

    <TD>EXHIBIT C</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD colspan="3" valign="top" align="left">Investor Certification</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">ii
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>SERIES 2001-1 SUPPLEMENT</B>, dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001 (as amended, supplemented or otherwise
modified and in effect from time to time, this &#147;<U>Series&nbsp;Supplement</U>&#148;) by and among <B>PIER 1
FUNDING, L.L.C.</B>, a Delaware limited liability company, as Transferor (the &#147;<U>Transferor</U>&#148;),
<B>PIER 1 IMPORTS (U.S.), INC.</B>, a Delaware corporation (&#147;<U>Pier 1</U>&#148;), as Servicer (in such
capacity, the &#147;<U>Servicer</U>&#148;), and <B>WELLS FARGO BANK MINNESOTA, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION</B>, a national
banking association organized and existing under the laws of the United States, as Trustee
(together with its successors in trust thereunder as provided in the Agreement referred to below,
the &#147;<U>Trustee</U>&#148;), under the Pooling and Servicing Agreement dated as of February&nbsp;12, 1997 (as
amended, supplemented, or otherwise modified and in effect from time to time, including amendments
in this Series&nbsp;Supplement, the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) among the Transferor, the Servicer and the
Trustee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;6.3 of the Agreement provides, among other things, that the Transferor and the Trustee
may at any time and from time to time enter into a supplement to the Agreement for the purpose of
authorizing the issuance by the Trustee to the Transferor, for execution and redelivery to the
Trustee for authentication, of one or more Series of Certificates.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant to this Series&nbsp;Supplement, the Transferor and the Trustee shall create a new Series
of Investor Certificates and shall specify the Principal Terms thereof. The Investor Certificates
shall not be subordinated to any other Series.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>SECTION 1.1</B>
<U><B>Designation</B></U><B>. </B>There is hereby created a Series of Investor Certificates to be issued
pursuant to the Agreement and this Series&nbsp;Supplement to be known generally as the &#147;<U>Series
2001-1 Certificates</U>.&#148; The Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificates shall be issued in two Classes, which
shall be designated generally as the Class&nbsp;A Variable Funding Asset-Backed Certificates, Series
2001-1 (the &#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Certificates</U>&#148;) and the Class&nbsp;B Variable Funding Asset-Backed
Certificates, Series&nbsp;2001-1 (the &#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Certificates</U>&#148;), each such Class bearing a
variable rate of interest and having an outstanding principal amount which may be increased or
decreased pursuant to Article&nbsp;VI of the Agreement. The Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificates shall be
included in a Group, which shall be designated as Group 1.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>SECTION
1.2</B> <U><B>Definitions</B></U><B>.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;In the event that any term or provision contained herein shall conflict with or be
inconsistent with any provision contained in the Agreement, the terms and provisions of this Series
Supplement shall govern with respect to the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificates. All Article, Section or
subsection references herein shall mean Article, Section or subsections of the Agreement, as
amended or supplemented by this Series&nbsp;Supplement, except as otherwise provided herein. All
capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the
Agreement. Each capitalized term defined herein shall relate only to Series&nbsp;2001-1 and to no other
Series issued by the Trust.
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">





<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Additional Class&nbsp;A Invested Amounts</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
Section&nbsp;6.15 of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Additional Class&nbsp;B Invested Amounts</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
Section&nbsp;6.17 of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Additional Interest</U>&#148; shall mean, at any time of determination, the sum of
Class&nbsp;A Additional Interest and Class&nbsp;B Additional Interest, if any.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Adjusted Discount Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean for any Monthly Period, the
percentage equivalent of a fraction, having as its numerator, the sum of the aggregate
Discount Option Receivables Collections for such Monthly Period and the aggregate Principal
Collections treated as Finance Charge Collections pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.7(j) of the
Agreement for such Monthly Period, and as its denominator, the Weighted Average Principal
Receivables during such Monthly Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Administrative Agent</U>&#148; shall mean Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York, in
its capacity as Administrative Agent under the Certificate Purchase Agreement, and its
successors and assigns.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Amortization Period</U>&#148; shall mean the period commencing on the Amortization
Period Commencement Date and continuing to, but not including, the earlier to occur of (i)
the date of termination of the Trust pursuant to Section&nbsp;12.1 of the Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the
Series&nbsp;2001-1 Termination Date.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Amortization Period Commencement Date</U>&#148; shall mean the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the
Commitment Expiration Date and (ii)&nbsp;the Pay Out Commencement Date.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Available Series&nbsp;2001-1 Finance Charge Collections</U>&#148; shall have the meaning
specified in Section&nbsp;4.11(a) of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Base Rate</U>&#148; shall mean, for any Monthly Period, the product of twelve and the
percentage equivalent of a fraction, the numerator of which is the sum of the Class&nbsp;A
Monthly Interest and Fees and the Monthly Servicing Fee for such Monthly Period, and the
denominator of which is the Weighted Average Invested Amount for such Monthly Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Carryover Class&nbsp;B Monthly Interest</U>&#148; shall mean on any Business Day in a
Monthly Period (i)&nbsp;any Class&nbsp;B Monthly Interest with respect to any Interest Accrual Period
beginning in a prior Monthly Period which has not previously been deposited in the Finance
Charge Account or paid on any previous Distribution Date <U>plus</U> (ii)&nbsp;any Class&nbsp;B
Additional Interest.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Certificate Purchase Agreement</U>&#148; shall mean that certain Certificate Purchase
Agreement, dated as of September&nbsp;4, 2001, by and among Transferor and Administrative
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">2
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">Agent,
and the Class&nbsp;A Purchasers (as such term is defined in the Certificate Purchase
Agreement), as the same may from time to time be amended, supplemented or otherwise
modified and in effect.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Change of Control</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Person, any event or series
of events by which:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) such Person merges or consolidates with or into another Person or the merger of
another Person with or into such Person, or the sale of all or substantially all the assets
of such Person to another Person, and, in the case of any such merger or consolidation, the
securities of such Person that are outstanding immediately prior to such transaction and
which represent 100% of the aggregate voting power of such Person are changed into or
exchanged for cash, securities or property, unless pursuant to such transaction such
securities are changed into or exchanged for, in addition to any other consideration,
securities of the surviving corporation that represent immediately after such transaction,
at least a majority of the aggregate voting power of the surviving corporation;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii) any &#147;person&#148; (as such term is used in Sections 13(d) and 14(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934) is or becomes the &#147;beneficial owner&#148; (as defined in Rules&nbsp;13d-3 and
13d-5 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) directly or indirectly, of the securities
representing more than 40% of the total voting power of such Person, except that such person
shall be deemed to have a beneficial ownership of all shares that such person has the right
to acquire, whether such right is exercisable immediately or only after the passage of time;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii) individuals who, on the Closing Date, constitute the board of directors of such
Person (the &#147;Incumbent Directors&#148;) cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of
the board of directors of such Person, provided that any person becoming a director
subsequent to the Closing Date whose election or nomination for election was approved by a
vote of at least two-thirds of the Incumbent Directors then in office (either by a specific
vote or by approval of the proxy-statement of such Person in which such individual is named
as a nominee for director, without objection to such nomination) shall be an Incumbent
Director; provided, however, no individual elected or nominated as a director of such Person
initially as a result of an actual or threatened election contest with respect to directors
or any other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of any
person other than the board of directors of such Person shall be deemed to be an Incumbent
Director.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Certificateholder</U>&#148; shall mean the Person in whose name a Class&nbsp;A
Certificate is registered in the Certificate Register.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Certificateholders&#146; Interest</U>&#148; shall mean, on any date of
determination, the portion of the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificateholders&#146; Interest evidenced by
the Class&nbsp;A Certificates.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">3
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Certificates</U>&#148; shall mean any of the certificates executed by the
Transferor and authenticated by or on behalf of the Trustee, substantially in the form of
<U><B>Exhibit &#147;A-1</B></U><B>&#148; </B>attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Initial Invested Amount</U>&#148; shall mean $100,000,000.00.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount</U>&#148; shall mean, when used with respect to any Business
Day, an amount (not less than zero) equal to (w)&nbsp;the Class&nbsp;A Initial Invested Amount,
<U>plus</U> (x)&nbsp;the aggregate principal amount of any Additional Class&nbsp;A Invested Amounts
purchased by the Class&nbsp;A Certificateholders on or prior to such Business Day pursuant to
Section&nbsp;6.15 of the Agreement, <U>minus</U> (y)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of principal payments
made to Class&nbsp;A Certificateholders prior to such Business Day, <U>minus</U> (z)&nbsp;the excess,
if any, of the aggregate amount of Class&nbsp;A Investor Charge-Offs for all prior Business Days
over Class&nbsp;A Investor Charge-Offs reimbursed pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.11(a)(iv) of the
Agreement prior to such Business Day, including, without limitation, by application of
funds, pursuant to Sections&nbsp;4.12(a) and (b)&nbsp;of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Investor Charge-Off</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section
4.15(b) of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Maximum Invested Amount</U>&#148; shall mean $100,000,000.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Monthly Interest and Fees</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in the
Certificate Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Monthly Principal</U>&#148; shall mean the monthly principal distributable in
respect of the Class&nbsp;A Certificates as calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.10(a) of the
Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any day, a fraction the
numerator of which is the Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount on such day and the denominator of which
is the Invested Amount on such day.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Projected Monthly Interest and Fees</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified
in the Certificate Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Required Amount</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Distribution Date,
the amount, if any, by which the sum of (w)&nbsp;the Class&nbsp;A Monthly Interest and Fees for such
Distribution Date, (x)&nbsp;the aggregate unreimbursed Class&nbsp;A Investor Charge-Offs as of the end
of the related Monthly Period, before giving effect to funds allocated pursuant to Section
4.11(a)(iv), (y)&nbsp;the Class&nbsp;A Required Amount Percentage of the aggregate of the Investor
Default Amounts for each Business Day during the related Monthly Period, and (z)&nbsp;the Class&nbsp;A
Required Amount Percentage of the Monthly Servicing Fee for the related Monthly Period,
exceeds the sum of Available Series&nbsp;2001-1 Finance Charge Collections, Transferor Finance
Charge Collections and Excess Finance Charge Collections on
each
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">4
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">Business Day during the
related Monthly Period applied with respect
thereto and the amount available to be drawn under the Store Payment Enhancement, if
any, on such Distribution Date pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.18 of the Agreement for application to
the amounts described in clauses (w)&nbsp;through (z)&nbsp;above.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;A Required Amount Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any
Distribution Date, the percentage equivalent of a fraction the numerator of which is the
Weighted Average Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount for each day in the preceding Monthly Period and
the denominator of which is the Weighted Average Invested Amount for each day in the
preceding Monthly Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Additional Interest</U>&#148; shall mean the additional interest, if any,
distributable in respect of the Class&nbsp;B Certificates as may be calculated pursuant to a
supplemental agreement entered into in accordance with Section&nbsp;1.12 hereof.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Certificate Rate</U>&#148; shall mean zero percent per annum;
<U>provided</U>,<U> however</U>, that such certificate may be increased pursuant to the
terms of a supplemental agreement entered into in accordance with Section&nbsp;1.12 hereof.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Certificateholder</U>&#148; shall mean the Person in whose name a Class&nbsp;B
Certificate is registered in the Certificate Register.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Certificateholders&#146; Interest</U>&#148; shall mean, on any date of
determination, the portion of the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificateholders&#146; Interest evidenced by
the Class&nbsp;B Certificates.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Certificates</U>&#148; shall mean any of the certificates executed by the
Transferor and authenticated by or on behalf of the Trustee, substantially in the form of
<U><B>Exhibit &#147;A-2</B></U><B>&#148; </B>attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Daily Principal Amount</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section
4.11(c)(iii) of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Initial Invested Amount</U>&#148; shall mean $9,289,617.49.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Invested Amount</U>&#148; shall mean, when used with respect to any Business
Day, an amount (not less than zero) equal to (i)&nbsp;the Class&nbsp;B Initial Invested Amount,
<U>plus</U> (ii)&nbsp;the aggregate principal amount of any Additional Class&nbsp;B Invested Amounts
pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.17 of the Agreement, <U>minus</U> (iii)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of
principal payments made to Class&nbsp;B Certificateholders prior to such Business Day,
<U>minus</U> (iv)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of Class&nbsp;B Investor Charge-Offs for all prior
Business Days, <U>minus</U> (v)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of Reallocated Class&nbsp;B Principal
Collections for all prior Distribution Dates <U>plus</U> (vi)&nbsp;the sum of the aggregate
amount allocated to the Class&nbsp;B Certificates and applied on all prior Business Days pursuant
to Section&nbsp;4.11(a)(v) of the Agreement,
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">5
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">including, without limitation, by application of
funds pursuant to Sections&nbsp;4.12(a) and (b)&nbsp;of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Investor Charge-Offs</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section
4.15(a) of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Minimum Required Amount</U>&#148; shall mean, at any time of determination, the
greater of (i)&nbsp;the quotient obtained by dividing (A)&nbsp;8.5% of the Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount at
such time by (B)&nbsp;0.915 and (ii)&nbsp;the sum of (A)&nbsp;3.0% of the Class&nbsp;A Purchase Limit at such
time and (B)&nbsp;3.0% of the quotient obtained by dividing (1)&nbsp;8.5% of the Class&nbsp;A Purchase
Limit at such time by (2)&nbsp;0.915; provided, however, that if the Class&nbsp;A Certificates have
been rated at least A by Standard &#038; Poor&#146;s and A2 by Moody&#146;s, then the Class&nbsp;B Minimum
Required Amount shall be in such amount as Standard &#038; Poor&#146;s and Moody&#146;s shall specify.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Monthly Interest</U>&#148; shall mean the monthly interest, if any,
distributable in respect of the Class&nbsp;B Certificates as may be calculated pursuant to a
supplemental agreement entered into in accordance with Section&nbsp;1.12 hereof.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Monthly Principal</U>&#148; shall mean the monthly principal distributable in
respect of the Class&nbsp;B Certificates as calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.10(b) of the
Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any day, a fraction the
numerator of which is the Class&nbsp;B Invested Amount on such day and the denominator of which
is the Invested Amount on such day.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Class&nbsp;B Principal Payment Commencement Date</U>&#148; shall mean the Distribution Date
on which the Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount is paid in full or, if there are no Principal
Collections allocable to the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Investor Certificates remaining after payments
have been made to the Class&nbsp;A Certificates on such Distribution Date, the Distribution Date
following the Distribution Date on which the Class&nbsp;A Invested Amount is paid in full.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Closing Date</U>&#148; shall mean September&nbsp;4, 2001.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Commitment Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in the
Certificate Purchase Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Daily Report</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;3.4(b) of the
Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Decrease Date</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;6.16(a) of the
Agreement.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">6
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Dilution Ratio</U>&#148; shall mean, for any Monthly Period, the percentage equivalent
of a fraction, the numerator of which is the aggregate amount of reductions to all
Receivables as a result of non-cash credits and returns during such Monthly Period, and
the denominator of which is the Weighted Average Principal Receivables for such Monthly
Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Distribution Date</U>&#148; shall mean October&nbsp;20, 2001, and the twentieth day of each
calendar month thereafter, or if such twentieth day is not a Business Day, the next
succeeding Business Day.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Early Amortization Period</U>&#148; shall mean the period commencing on the Pay Out
Commencement Date and ending on the earlier to occur of (i)&nbsp;the date of termination of the
Trust pursuant to Section&nbsp;12.1 of the Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Termination Date.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Eligible Store Payment Enhancement Institution</U>&#148; shall mean (a)&nbsp;a depository
institution (which may be the Trustee or an Affiliate thereof) organized under the laws of
the United States or any one of the states thereof that at all times (i)&nbsp;has either (x)&nbsp;a
long-term unsecured debt rating of A2 or better by Moody&#146;s or (y)&nbsp;a certificate of deposit
rating of P-1 by Moody&#146;s; (ii)&nbsp;has either (x)&nbsp;a long-term unsecured debt rating of A or
better by Standard &#038; Poor&#146;s or (y)&nbsp;a certificate of deposit rating of A-1 or better by
Standard &#038; Poor&#146;s; and (iii)&nbsp;is a member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (or
any successor) or (b)&nbsp;any other institution that is acceptable to the Rating Agencies.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Enhancement</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to the Class&nbsp;A Certificates, the
subordination of the Class&nbsp;B Invested Amount.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Excess Finance Charge Collections</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Business
Day, as the context requires, either (x)&nbsp;the amount described in Section&nbsp;4.11(a)(viii) of
the Agreement allocated to the Investor Certificates but available to cover shortfalls in
amounts paid from Total Finance Charge Collections for other Series, if any, or (y)&nbsp;the
aggregate amount of Total Finance Charge Collections allocable to other Series in excess of
the amounts necessary to make required payments with respect to such Series, if any, and
available to cover shortfalls with respect to the Investor Certificates.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Finance Charge Shortfall</U>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;4.12(b)
of the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Fixed/Floating Allocation Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean for any Business Day (i)&nbsp;with
respect to Principal Collections, the percentage equivalent of a fraction, the numerator of
which is the Invested Amount at the end of the last day of the Revolving Period and the
denominator of which is the greater of (a)&nbsp;the sum of the aggregate amount of Principal
Receivables in the Trust and the amount on deposit in the Excess Funding Account as of the
end of the preceding Business Day and (b)&nbsp;the sum of the numerators used to calculate the
investor allocation percentages with respect to Principal Receivables with respect to
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">7
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">all
Classes of all Series then outstanding on such Business Day as specified in the applicable
Supplements; and (ii)&nbsp;with respect to Finance Charge Collections on and after the Pay Out
Commencement Date, the percentage equivalent of a fraction, the numerator of which is the
Invested Amount at the end of the Business Day preceding the
Pay Out Commencement Date and the denominator of which is the greater of (a)&nbsp;the sum of
the aggregate amount of Principal Receivables in the Trust and the amount on deposit in the
Excess Funding Account as of the end of the preceding Business Day and (b)&nbsp;the sum of the
numerators used to calculate the investor allocation percentages with respect to Finance
Charge Collections with respect to all Classes of all Series then outstanding on such
Business Day.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Floating Allocation Percentage</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Business Day,
the percentage equivalent of a fraction, numerator of which is the Invested Amount on such
Business Day and the denominator of which is the greater of (i)&nbsp;the sum of the amount of
Principal Receivables in the Trust and the amount on deposit in the Excess Funding Account
as of the end of the preceding Business Day and (ii)&nbsp;the sum of the numerators used to
calculate the Investor Percentages with respect to all Classes of all Series then
outstanding on such Business Day.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Group 1</U>&#148; shall mean the Series&nbsp;2001-1 Certificates, which will be the only
Series in such Group.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<U>Interest Accrual Period</U>&#148; shall mean, with respect to a Distribution Date, the
Monthly Period most recently ended prior to such Distribution Date, except that the Interest
Accrual Period with respect to the first Distribution Date will be the period commencing on
and including the Closing Date and ending on and including the last day of the Monthly
Period ending on or about September&nbsp;30, 2001, and the Interest Accrual Period with respect
to the last Distribution Date will be the period commencing on and including the first day
